aboutusintro.title: About Shiv Brass
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering, Unmatched Quality
aboutusintro.description: Founded in 1993, Shiv Brass has established itself as a leading precision components manufacturer serving automotive and aerospace industries. We combine decades of engineering expertise with state-of-the-art manufacturing technology to deliver high-quality, custom-engineered components that meet the most demanding specifications.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.content: Shiv Brass has been our trusted manufacturing partner for over a decade. Their precision, reliability, and commitment to quality are unmatched in the industry.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.content: The technical expertise and custom engineering capabilities of Shiv Brass have been crucial to our complex component requirements. Exceptional service and quality.
